attributes.action: Drop all charges against pensioner Richard Osborn Brookes
attributes.background: Richard Osborn Brooke’s was arrested on suspicion of murder on the 4th of april at his south London home, 2 men 1 armed with a screwdriver, broke into his house and he rightfully defended himself and his wife, petition too drop all charges immediatley

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The police and the CPS are responsible for deciding whether to charge people with a crime. 

You may find this guidance from the Crown Prosecution Service helpful:

https://www.cps.gov.uk/publication/decision-charge
